original_text: And then shall he send his angels, and shall gather together his elect from the four winds, from the uttermost part of the earth to the uttermost part of heaven.
korean_text: 또 그 때에 그가 천사들을 보내어 자기가 택하신 자들을 땅 끝으로부터 하늘 끝까지 사방에서 모으리라

sentences.original_text: And then shall he send his angels
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 자기 천사들을 보낼 것이요

sentences.original_text: and shall gather together his elect
from the uttermost part of the earth
to the uttermost part of heaven
